flavor: Youâ€™re accustomed to scouting out ahead of everyone else, making sure the road is safe for the valuables aboard a House Orien trade caravan, not to mention your comrades and the passengers traveling with the caravan. What routes do  you know like the back of your hand? What monsters and bandit gangs have you had to deal with? Were you ever lost in the wilderness, with or without your caravan?
name: Caravan Scout
